name: Unknown Corridor
description:
Unknown Corridor is an industrial horror puzzle-platformer for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2.

You wake up in an old abandoned factory with no recollection of how you ended up there. It's up to you to use your wit to get out and escape the dreadful feeling that you aren't the only one there. Better do it fast before finding out if you're right!

A collaborative effort with The Doc and MachineFossil.

_______________________________________________________

Keyboard Controls:

  • Walk/Climb: Arrow Keys
  • Interact: Space/Enter
  • Cancel: Escape/Backspace

Gamepad:

  • Walk/Climb: Left Stick/D-Pad
  • Interact: A/X
  • Cancel: B/O

_______________________________________________________

Thanks for playing!
